description:
Bring comfort and breathability on every run with this Synth t-shirt. Whether it’s on the seawall or trail, you’ll forget about the shirt and focus on the path ahead.

  • 100% polyester this is soft and light for all day comfort
  • Flatlock seams won’t get in the way when you push your limits
  • Body mapped mesh keeps you cool when the run heats up
  • Regular fit leaves room for you to move and air to flow
name: La Sportiva Synth Shirt - Men's
